segments.text: Did your wife give birth yet ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah . She's a healthy beautiful girl .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Congratulations . How is your wife doing ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: She is tired , but getting a lot of rest now .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm just glad there were no complications .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If your wife and baby are both happy , what more can you ask for ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's been a week , and I haven't slept that well .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's normal for anyone with a newborn .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , but it's so hard . I have to work , and then go home and take care of my wife and the baby . I'm going to get sick at this rate .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You'll get used to it . After everything stabilizes , you can regain your health .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's true . I should make sure my wife and baby stay healthy during this time .
segments.speaker: S2
